description:
Taoka Moichi is Ryonan`s coach and a contemporary of Kainan`s Takato Riki, who is a year younger than him. Both of them have known each other since high school, when Taoka was known as "Kanagawa`s Taoka". Taoka compares himself to Sendoh, which his players find hard to believe. Both men are still friends, but are also rivals.
Source: wikipedia
name: Taoka Moichi
